Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 and HEK293T cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was significantly reduced for 60delA, 60delC, and 60delG variants compared to wild-type.

Experiment Method.Statistical Method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis
Experiment Method.Threshold for Normal: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type
Experiment Method.Threshold for Abnormal: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type

Material used.Description: Immunoprecipitation experiments were conducted in HEK293T cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced interaction between DJ-1 variants and target proteins compared to wild-type.
